dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will fiercely argue and defend their stance, potentially leading to heated conflicts.
Your FarTwin will work with others to find a mutually beneficial solution, prioritizing cooperation over individual interests.

dimensions.label: Creative Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle new challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems systematically, methodically breaking them down into manageable parts.
Your FarTwin will rely on their instincts and creative instincts to find innovative solutions to challenges.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin analyze data and information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will critically evaluate evidence, ensuring accuracy and thoroughness in their analysis.
Your FarTwin will quickly scan the surface of information, without deeply examining underlying details or context.

dimensions.label: Emotional Intelligence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate complex social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively listen and understand the emotions of others, showing compassion and support.
Your FarTwin will suppress their own emotions and maintain a neutral demeanor, even in difficult social situations.

dimensions.label: Achievement Motivation
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach personal challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive to outdo themselves and others, often prioritizing success over personal growth.
Your FarTwin will focus on self-improvement, seeking progress and learning from their experiences.

dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin acquire new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through hands-on experience, actively engaging with the material and applying it to real-world situations.
Your FarTwin will focus on abstract concepts and theoretical frameworks, analyzing and understanding the underlying principles before applying them.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new opportunities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take on bold and uncertain challenges, seeking excitement and adrenaline.
Your FarTwin will approach new opportunities with a measured and calculated approach, weighing risks and considering potential consequences before acting.
